DOC.brief_summary: This study randomize , parallel group , open label trial use warfarin comparator . Pharmacokinetics ( PK ) pharmacodynamics ( PD ) investigate BAY59-7939 group ( originally describe Japanese ) .
DOC.criteria: Japanese subject nonvalvular AF meet follow criterion : Persistent paroxysmal nonvalvular AF > /=2 episodes enrollment , least 1 verified ECG recording within 4 week randomization Male subject age 20 year old postmenopausal female subject Subjects least one risk factor thromboembolism age 60 year old ( Risk factor thromboembolism : hypertension , diabetes mellitus , coronary artery disease , congestive heart failure ) . History presence stroke transient ischemic attack . History intracerebral hemorrhage . History presence bleed randomization ; intraocular gastrointestinal bleeding within last 6 month prior randomization .
